description.message: Download videos from any website in one click. Works on Facebook, Twitter, Dailymotion, and more. Always with sound. Any resolution

protectedText.message: Unable to download videos because of the website policy

agreementText.message: Please read and accept privacy policy to start using this extension. Clicking Accept you confirm accepting all terms and conditions of this browser extension use.

playVideo2Detect.message: Start playing the video on the site to make it visible in the extension

noVideos.message: No videos to download on this page

downloadInAnotherTab.message: Downloading in another tab… Please wait

downloadNotFinished.message: Another video is downloading… Please wait
